A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How is it even possible for a movie so depressingly insipid? The entire audience walked out of the theater completely shell-shocked. It really is hard to tell what was worse: the writing\, the pacing\, the embarrassing plot holes and cringe-worthy characterization... in a franchise that first and foremost has always been about good old-fashioned storytelling TLJ didn't even give us one coherent storyline to hang onto for dear life through this miserable hellish ride. I don't know which movie all these 'critics' saw but it can't possibly be the same one as we did.
